remarks: The inverse of a nonzero group element is a nonzero group element. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 27-Feb-2015.)
statement:
grpinvnzcl.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
grpinvnzcl.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
grpinvnzcl.n $e |- N = ( invg ` G ) $.
grpinvnzcl $p |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ X e. ( B \ { .0. } ) ) -> ( N ` X ) e. ( B \ { .0. } ) ) $.
